thread.title: Watch: Senate Minority Leader Schumer Tears Up as He Vows to Fight Trump’s Ban
thread.title_full: Watch: Senate Minority Leader Schumer Tears Up as He Vows to Fight Trump’s Ban

author: Pam Key
title: Watch: Senate Minority Leader Schumer Tears Up as He Vows to Fight Trump’s Ban
text: Sunday at a press conference, Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-NY) fought back tears as he vowed to do everything he can to “overturn” President Donald Trump’s executive order that halted immigration from seven Muslim-majority countries into the United States. Schumer said, “This executive order was mean spirited and un-American.” He added, “It must be reversed immediately. Senate Democrats are going to introduce legislation to overturn this and move it as quickly as we can.” Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
